ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Caliber Armament
ResearchProjectDef.description: "Develops heavy caliber armament for use on spacecraft, enabling the firing of high-powered and precise projectiles. This advanced technology allows spacecraft to inflict significant damage on enemy targets and provides a tactical advantage in space combat."
